long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Page Analyzer is a tool that helps you quickly analyze the SEO content of a webpage. With a single click, you can get detailed information about:

- Page Title and its length
- Meta Description and its length
- Word Count
- Character Count
- Headings (H1, H2, H3, H4, H5)

This extension is perfect for SEO specialists, content creators, and anyone who needs to understand the structure and main content of a webpage at a glance.
